newsitem.title: USA: Spiegel Eddie Bauer April same store sales down.
newsitem.headline: Spiegel Eddie Bauer April same store sales down.

text.p: Spiegel Inc said Thursday same store sales for its Eddie Bauer unit for the four weeks ended April 26 declined two percent.
This year's four-week period excluded the pre-Easter week ended March 29, 1997, versus last year's four-week period, which included the pre-Easter sales week which ended April 6, 1996.
Comparable-store sales for Eddie Bauer had increased six percent in April 1996.
For the 17 weeks ended April 26, 1997, comparable-store sales increased two percent.
Spiegel reported total net sales of $182.0 million for the four weeks ended April 26, a decrease of one percent from sales of $183.4 million for the same period last year.
For the 17 weeks ended April 26, 1997, total sales were $751.8 million, a decrease of three percent from $772.9 million in the same period last year.
